post.body: How about something on Feels like Home? :) Can't get you a link though because I'm at work.
oh! I don't have her insurance info. Should I just call my own company?
oh. How funny. Maybe because it's a good program?:) And it goes well with GMail. I've been using for a year. Never had a problem.
Did your rates go up?
Right. This was a girl my age. Wants me to fax the estimate to her husband.
Mine was very fast. Not that it matters. :(
It's a craze?
Yeah, we're fine. The crash was very minor.
Yes, we had school. It was a short day for the kids, though, because the teachers had a class this afternoon.
Right. That's what the body shop guy said. I guess I have to call the girl back. I'll wait til after he looks at it on Monday.
Oh! Really?That hadn't even occurred to me. What did they say when you called your insurance?
Have you tried Remember the Milk?
Were the crashes serious? I've heard that in PA, any accident "counts" against you on insurance. I was rear ended. :(
I'm a little stressed out, but okay. How are you?
No. It was just a very minor fender bender. My fender got cracked, though, so it needs to be fixed.
No way! I have a silly GOP husband, too.
Thanks Jessica. :) It looks like everything is going to be fine. Their adjuster will come out and look at it this week.
indeed there is. :) I'm glad for that.
Yes, they do. I'm eating the slice of peanut butter pie I bought the night of my car accident.
Yes! Indeed, I do.
hm. I'll have to check into that. Thanks.
Yes. I told him he should come. A friend is moving to California, and several others are taking her out to dinner.
like regular old Dawn? Really? Others have suggested peroxide.
Okay. I'll check that out tomorrow after work. In between the body shop for the car and my dinner date. :)
Like the kits they sell at the drug store?
I started looking at them yesterday, but wasn't sure if cleaning out the wax on the outside would help. You think it will?
okay. I'm going to try that. I'm feeling desperate.
usually it's a bunch of bloggers who post a product review at the same time or in a scheduled window of time.
oh, don't fill up the ear canal? :) That's what Iwas imagining.
okay. Will look at it more.
Yeah!!! Thank you! :)
Understandable. I don't like them either.
oh, it is that good. :) And you would be correct. First anniv. Valentine's Day. Tonight. 3. That's it.
That's awesome. Be sure to @ me when it's up. :) I want to come look.
Forgetting to use?!?! UGH! That's a sacrilege!
Thank you :) Guess how many we've had in 18 months.
yes! It was so good!
Was our third time. The Melting Pot is one of life's great pleasures. :)
Yes? Are they as easy as The Melting Pot makes them seem? I'd love to do them at home.
oh, okay. I was hoping you were joining your husband. Sorry.
Are you moving? I read something about packing.
Nothing around my computer screen. :)
YES! We adore it. It's so expensive though, we save for very special days like birthdays & anniversaries. :)
happy birthday to you, too! :)
RT @LookNoHands: RT @michellemcox: I just posted my FIRST EVER GIVEAWAY ($48 value). Please visit and RT. Thnx. http://tinyurl.com/5ezpa7
Just got off of the phone with my insurance company. So relieved! Thanks for your advice. They said to try to get her insurance co to pay.
Okay. I'm convinced. I'm going to call my insurance company right now.
Girl who hit me wants to pay for car repairs w/o insurance. Body shop said call insurance co anyway. Confused. What a mess.
I'm going to bed early for a change. Good night, my Tweets!
Anyone have a good recipe for kheer? Had it tonight at Indian restaurant and fell in love.
On a positive note, the girl who rear ended me has decided to involve her insurance company. I think the $1,000 prelim estimate helped.
Hi Tweets! I'm a little sad tonight. Had dinner w/girlfriend who's moving to California on Wednesday. :(
I wanted to write several other things, but must get to bed. Not enough hours in the day. Will Tweet you all later. Good night!
Have you enterred by blog makeover giveaway? You can win a $50+ custome blog makeover from Where to Start Websites! http://is.gd/bg41
I want to stay up and write, but I just can't. Too tired. Eyes falling shut. Good night my Tweets.
Be right back. I have to run Grandma (the baby sitter) back to her house.
Just got home from an obscenely expensive birthday dinner for hubs at The Melting Pot. Totally worth it for a romantic, grown up night out.
RT @typeamom: Help ppl w/ last-minute cheap gift ideas AND win prizes. Just a couple hours left to enter! http://snurl.com/8wrtz #foodgifts
Only a couple more hours to enter the food gifts contest at Foodie Mama - still more prizes than entries! http://is.gd/crQL
RT @AngEngland: "Boosting Your Baby's Brain Power" Book Review & GIVEAWAY! Enter to win great book http://snipr.com/8uh7q Plz RT
